description: Readmissions, Complications and Deaths - provider data. This data set includes provider data for 30-day death and readmission measures, the hip/knee complication measure, and the Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ) measures of serious complications.

name: Readmissions Complications and Deaths - Hospital
